mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_prod (NAME, AD, ORIGIN_PRICE, PRICE, MERCHANT_ID, PROD_CAT_ID, PROD_BRAND_ID, MEASURE_UNIT, TYPE, STOCK_WARNING, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PUTAWAY_TIME, SOLDOUT_TIME, DETAIL, VENDOR_ID, PROD_BRAND_NAME, CITY_ID, BASE_PROD_ID, INVENTORY, PRICE_MANNER, MEASURE_UNIT_COUNT, STATUS ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodBrandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{measureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockWarning,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{putawayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{soldoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodBrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseProdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceManner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{measureUnitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update rc_prod
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AD = #{ad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_PRICE = #{originPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROD_CAT_ID = #{prodCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROD_BRAND_ID = #{prodBrandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEASURE_UNIT = #{measureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STOCK_WARNING = #{stockWarning,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=REAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PUTAWAY_TIME = #{putawayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SOLDOUT_TIME = #{soldoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
VENDOR_ID = #{vendorId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROD_BRAND_NAME = #{prodBrandName,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BASE_PROD_ID = #{baseProdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INVENTORY = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SOLD_NUM = #{soldNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE_MANNER = #{priceManner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEASURE_UNIT_COUNT = #{measureUnitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select PROD_ID, NAME, AD, ORIGIN_PRICE, PRICE, MERCHANT_ID, PROD_CAT_ID, PROD_BRAND_ID, MEASURE_UNIT, TYPE, STOCK_WARNING, DEL_FLAG, SCORE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PUTAWAY_TIME, SOLDOUT_TIME, DETAIL, VENDOR_ID, PROD_BRAND_NAME, CITY_ID, BASE_PROD_ID, INVENTORY, SOLD_NUM, PRICE_MANNER, MEASURE_UNIT_COUNT from rc_prod where PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
